LanguageData.JRWTanystropheus.label: Tanystropheus
LanguageData.JRWTanystropheus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #029341-1952 [TANYSTROPHEUS GRANDIS] CODENAME: COBRA >382
A reptile with an elongated neck. Sequence gaps filled with Eunectes murinus DNA allow the creature to constrict prey using its powerful neck muscles while holding their victims down with sharp, hook like claws.
